text: [Music]
stanford's modern construction program
launched in collaboration with the
project production institute is a
professional education initiative that
bridges cutting edge research with
realworld industry applications through
in-person workshops online learning and
hands-on experiences participants
explore how operation science can
optimize project production systems from
design through construction and in the
modern construction program we teach
professionals modern methods of managing
the production on our projects the
student will learn how to set the right
targets how to set up these processes
how to test them how to validate them
how to communicate them and how to
improve
them construction industry has a huge
challenge there's constant increase in
demand to deliver the project cheaper
and faster at the same time a lot of the
skilled workforce are starting to
actually retire we need to figure out
how we're going to meet our demand
what the participants will learn is the
ability to map model simulate optimize a
production system and deise ways to
control that production system so it
behaves the way they intended to behave
so that it meets the intended schedule
and cost objectives the model
construction program is a complete
framework that teach us the technical
part and also the soft skills how you
analyze a problem optimize it deliver
value to the client but also how to sell
that value to the
[Music]
client one of the things that we do as
part of this program is have something
called a monthly check-in during that
phase the participants report out on the
progress that they have made the program
is true collaboration between Stanford
and the leaders of the project
production institute students in the
program will benefit from the combined
experiences of the instructors who are
engaged in these endeavors on the
academic side and in industry this
program brings that injection of
innovation and trying to accelerate the
innovation curve in the global
engineering and construction industry
learning new concepts learning science
like operation science for instance
which dictates how production systems
behave personally I loved the
interaction between the professors and
the participant in the course i really
see three main benefits of the program
first of all you will be totally up to
date with the most modern methods of
managing production including digital
methods automation
industrialization second you will gain a
network of professionals that are also
innovation-minded and pushing the
envelope in terms of how well they
manage the production of projects and
finally you will walk away with a
framework a new foundation that will
enable you to continue to innovate that
makes most sense for you and your
projects stanford's experience is
amazing i love the methodology of
Stanford i found in the Stanford the
best option around the world i am
convinced that this new methodologies
can change the construction industry
modern construction program is helping
us to see things that we could not see
before thank you to this program I will
be able to open a new business line in
my life i encourage you to enroll in the
program if any of uh these points
resonate with you if you see
opportunities for improvement but uh
need to find a way of really showing
them and building a coalition in your
organization to make those improvements
happen i believe the modern construction
program is the right place for you
[Music]
